name: data-be-analyse-1m-short2
open_rule1: agg.candle_size/agg.avg_candles > 2 and res[0].close > res[0].open and agg.candle_size > 1
open_rule2: agg.candle_size/agg.avg_candles > 2 and res[0].close > res[0].open and agg.candle_size > 1 and (res[0].high > res[0].bb_200[0] or res[1].high > res[1].bb_200[0])
